name: Ghee
instructions: Heat the butter in a light-colored high-sided 10- to 12-inch skillet on medium heat until it has melted and is frothy, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low and skim the froth from the top using a ladle, large spoon or mesh skimmer.Â
Continue cooking on low until the solids in the butter have sunk to the bottom of the pan and have browned, about 15 minutes.

Using a fine-mesh sieve or a double layer of fine cheesecloth set over a strainer, strain the ghee into a heat proof jar. To store, let cool to room temperature, about 1 1/2 hours, then cover and refrigerate.
